scripts.dev: bun run --cwd apps/server dev & bun run --cwd apps/web dev
scripts.build: bun run --cwd apps/server build && bun run --cwd apps/web build
scripts.typecheck: bun run --cwd apps/server typecheck && bun run --cwd apps/web typecheck
scripts.build:npm: bun run --cwd apps/web build && bun run --cwd apps/server db:generate && bun run --cwd packages/cli build:cli && mkdir -p packages/cli/prisma && cp apps/server/prisma/schema.prisma packages/cli/prisma/schema.prisma && mkdir -p packages/cli/dist/static && cp -r apps/server/src/static/. packages/cli/dist/static/
scripts.publish:npm: bun run build:npm && cd packages/cli && npm publish
scripts.publish:npm:dry: bun run build:npm && cd packages/cli && npm pack --dry-run
